text.p: Full Beauty - (built 1994) 70,198 dwt 14 on 28 del S.Korea prompt three to five months trading $10,600 daily Iino.
Joyous Society - (built 1994) 69,274 dwt 14.5 on 31 plus 1.5 del S.Korea 20/30 July three to six months trading $10,600 daily Sinochart.
Amber - - (built 1978) 67,812 dwt 12 on 34 plus 3 del Skaw July trip via Poland redel Singapore/Japan range $12,500 daily Albatross.
Captain John L - (built 1983) 63,900 daily 13 on 30 plus 2 del Egyptian Med three to five months trading redel Atlantic $8,750 daily Halla.
Ken Galaxy - (built 1985) 42,500 dwt del Port Kelang July trip via Bintang redel Japan $8,500 daily Taiheiyo.
Bunga Melor Empat - (built 1995) 43,000 dwt del Hong Kong spot trip via Australia redel Far East high $8,000 daily BHP.
Ilena - (built 1977) 27,476 dwt del Canakkale prompt trip transatlantic redel Black Sea $5,750 daily E.D.F. Man.
Rio Madeira - - (built 1976) 23,851 dwt 13 on 27 plus 2 del Murmansk prompt trip WCCA $6,225 daily Continental Lines.
TBN - 21,000 dwt del Puerto Cabello 20/30 July trip Buenaventura approx. $7,500 daily Clipper.
Pella - (built 1979) 17,190 dwt del Rouen mid July trip WAF $6,000 daily Baco Line.
